p: The ACTION Cohort is one of the largest PEPFAR-supported programs in Nigeria. Viral load testing was conducted for patients to confirm HIV treatment failure. A total of 191 samples from patients who resided in Abuja between 2011 and 2014 underwent genotypic analysis for drug resistance. The median age was 36 (IQR, 13) and 58% of the patients were female. The median CD4 cell count was 154.
